snippet: The attackers behind the siege of the Westgate shopping mall had been living in Nairobi and plotted the attack for several months, a Western official briefed on the investigation said.
abstract: Kenyan officials say they have determined the identities of four of the attackers who stormed the Westgate shopping mall in Nairobi; Western official briefed on the investigation says the attackers had been living in Nairobi and plotting the attack for several months.
lead_paragraph: The attackers behind the siege of the Westgate shopping mall had been living in Nairobi and plotted the attack for several months, a Western official briefed on the investigation said.

headline.main: Kenya: New Details on Mall Attackers
headline.print_headline: Kenya: New Details on Mall Attackers
